      • buildChartJson

        public javax.json.JsonArray buildChartJson(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.Double> values,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> labels)
        buildChartJson

        public JsonArray buildChartJson(String name, List<Double> values, List<String> labels)

        Build a JsonArray of chart containing labels and their values:
        [[{value: x}, {value: y}, {value: z}], {name: foo}, [{label: a}, {label: b}, {label: c}]]

        Parameters:
        name - - The name of label
        values - - The value of the label
        labels - - labels.
        Returns:
        A JsonArray of chart data.

        Returns:

      • buildValue

        public javax.json.JsonObject buildValue(java.lang.Double value)
        buildValue

        public JsonObject buildValue(Double value)

        Build JsonObject of value:
        {value: x}

        Parameters:
        value - - The value.
        Returns:
        A JsonObject of value:value; (name:value) format.

        Returns:
